en: Acceptance of criticism
I accept comments in order to improve my work
Ability to receive feedback and comments to improve work
Adaptability
I'm tuning in
Ability to accept and integrate changes; to adapt to people and the environment in a positive way
Analytical skills
I analyse problems to find solutions
Ability to reflect, use logic and judgement in decision-making and problem evaluation
Assertiveness
Neither aggression, nor submission, nor manipulation
Ability to express oneself and defend one's rights without infringing on those of others
Attendance
I am faithful to the post
Ability to provide a regular and sustained active presence
Attention
I am focused on my task
Ability to voluntarily focus one's mind on a specific object or task
Autonomy
I'm in charge
Ability to take responsibility for oneself in order to take action at the appropriate time in a given context
Care
My work is neat, clean and tidy
Ability to care for the cleanliness, neatness and thoroughness of the tasks performed
Communication
Message received! Transmitter ok receiver ok
Ability to relate to others, to convey a message by adapting to the person and the circumstances
Compliance with the rules
I take into account the regulations
Ability to comply with requirements, regulations, administrative procedures and operating rules
Decision-making capacity
I slice
Ability to make a decision when faced with a set of facts
Efficiency
I achieve my objectives on time with the given means
Ability to produce the expected results on time and to achieve the set objectives
Initiative
I dare to be proactive
Ability to be proactive in anticipating needs and demands independently, without instructions or guidelines.
Innovation
I solve problems in an original and effective way
Ability to introduce novelty in problem solving
Intellectual curiosity
I am intellectually curious about my job
Ability to be open-minded, to continuously acquire new knowledge and learn from previous experiences
Motivation
I am enthusiastic in carrying out my tasks
Ability to have energy, vitality, to show interest and enthusiasm in a professional task
Order
Everything in its place and a place for everything
Ability to put things in a specific place in an organised and systematic way
Organisational skills
I plan, prepare and organise my work to meet deadlines
Ability to effectively and efficiently manage one's work and plan tasks to be completed within a prescribed timeframe
Perseverance
I make the effort to complete my work
Ability to perform a task over the long term, making extra efforts and not giving up when faced with obstacles
Personal hygiene
I take care of myself
Ability to take care of personal hygiene and cleanliness of clothing
Presentation
I have the look of the job
Ability to dress and groom in a manner appropriate to the work environment and the trade
Reliability
I inspire confidence
Ability to inspire confidence in others through actions
Self-control
I keep my cool in all circumstances
Ability to deal with particular situations, to show composure without being overly emotional or defensive
Sense of ethics
I am faithful to the values of my profession
Abitlity to act according to the professions values in order to seek the most appropriate decision in a given situation
Sense of responsibility
I take responsibility for the consequences of decisions related to my tasks
Ability to act responsibly and make appropriate decisions within one's capacity to act
Team spirit
One for all, all for one!
Ability to connect with team members with a common goal of collaboration, while focusing on the success of the group
Tolerance
I accept the difference
Ability to respect the freedom of others, their ways of thinking, acting, political and religious opinions
